name: Send an email when a QR code is created
description:
This template automatically sends an email whenever a new QR Code is created in CodeQR.

It is ideal for confirmation messages, internal notifications, or operational workflows that require visibility into newly created QR Codes. The email includes essential details such as the destination URL, QR Code type, creator information, and a QR Code image preview.

The scenario is triggered by the qrcode.created event from CodeQR and requires minimal setup. Simply connect your CodeQR webhook, configure your email service, and define the recipient address to start receiving notifications instantly.

Apps used: CodeQR, Email

This template was created by CodeQR.
Learn more at https://codeqr.io
